articles.title: U-19 World Cup star Archana Devi’s mother Savitri Devi was called a witch, taunted for ‘showing daughter wrong path’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Mother's stubbornness in encouraging her cricket came from dying brother's last words to let her play
articles.content: After she lost her husband to cancer and a son to a snake-bite, she was called a ‘daayan’ (a witch). Then Savitri Devi was blamed by relatives for sending daughter Archana on galat rasta (wrong path)… [+5531 chars]
